entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
